2.text: “Speak to the children of Israel, and say to them, ‘I am Yahweh your God.

3.text: You shall not do as they do in the land of Egypt, where you lived: and you shall not do as they do in the land of Canaan, where I am bringing you; neither shall you walk in their statutes.

4.text: You shall do my ordinances, and you shall keep my statutes, and walk in them: I am Yahweh your God.

5.text: You shall therefore keep my statutes and my ordinances; which if a man does, he shall live in them: I am Yahweh.

6.text: “‘None of you shall approach anyone who are his close relatives, to uncover their nakedness: I am Yahweh.

7.text: “‘You shall not uncover the nakedness of your father, nor the nakedness of your mother: she is your mother. You shall not uncover her nakedness.

8.text: “‘You shall not uncover the nakedness of your father’s wife: it is your father’s nakedness.

9.text: “‘You shall not uncover the nakedness of your sister, the daughter of your father, or the daughter of your mother, whether born at home, or born abroad.

10.text: “‘You shall not uncover the nakedness of your son’s daughter, or of your daughter’s daughter, even their nakedness: for theirs is your own nakedness.

11.text: “‘You shall not uncover the nakedness of your father’s wife’s daughter, conceived by your father, since she is your sister.

12.text: “‘You shall not uncover the nakedness of your father’s sister: she is your father’s near kinswoman.

13.text: “‘You shall not uncover the nakedness of your mother’s sister: for she is your mother’s near kinswoman.

14.text: “‘You shall not uncover the nakedness of your father’s brother, you shall not approach his wife: she is your aunt.

15.text: “‘You shall not uncover the nakedness of your daughter-in-law: she is your son’s wife. You shall not uncover her nakedness.

16.text: “‘You shall not uncover the nakedness of your brother’s wife: it is your brother’s nakedness.

17.text: “‘You shall not uncover the nakedness of a woman and her daughter. You shall not take her son’s daughter, or her daughter’s daughter, to uncover her nakedness; they are near kinswomen: it is wickedness.

18.text: “‘You shall not take a wife to her sister, to be a rival, to uncover her nakedness, while her sister is yet alive.

19.text: “‘You shall not approach a woman to uncover her nakedness, as long as she is impure by her uncleanness.

20.text: “‘You shall not lie carnally with your neighbor’s wife, and defile yourself with her.

21.text: “‘You shall not give any of your children to sacrifice to Molech; neither shall you profane the name of your God: I am Yahweh.

22.text: “‘You shall not lie with a man, as with a woman. That is detestable.

23.text: “‘You shall not lie with any animal to defile yourself with it; neither shall any woman give herself to an animal, to lie down with it: it is a perversion.

24.text: “‘Don’t defile yourselves in any of these things: for in all these the nations which I am casting out before you were defiled.

25.text: The land was defiled: therefore I punished its iniquity, and the land vomited out her inhabitants.

26.text: You therefore shall keep my statutes and my ordinances, and shall not do any of these abominations; neither the native-born, nor the stranger who lives as a foreigner among you;

27.text: (for all these abominations have the men of the land done, that were before you, and the land became defiled);

28.text: that the land not vomit you out also, when you defile it, as it vomited out the nation that was before you.

29.text: “‘For whoever shall do any of these abominations, even the souls that do them shall be cut off from among their people.

30.text: Therefore you shall keep my requirements, that you do not practice any of these abominable customs, which were practiced before you, and that you do not defile yourselves with them: I am Yahweh your God.’”
